The deadline to submit proposal is  2024-06-12.  It is a No bid price on this project as it is part of the Supply Arrangement for Office Furniture and Panel System.  The project area is
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title:** MM100-078465 Interconnecting Panels and Free Standing Systems
**Reference Number:** WS4541387806-Doc4577115402

**Notice of Amendment:** This announcement is a Modification to the existing request for proposal. All required documentation and bid submissions must be received by **June 12, 2024, at 14:00:00 EDT**.

### Tender Overview

Public Service and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Department of Employment and Social Development, invites suppliers to submit bids for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture in Edmonton, Alberta, in accordance with the tender requirements outlined below.

### Key Requirements

* The tender falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).
* Suppliers must participate in the General Stream of Suppliers (Supply Arrangement holders) as specified in the Product Classification(ies).
* The scope of the tender includes products classified under the following categories:
	+ Product Category 1: Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
* Suppliers are warned that failure to meet the specified deadlines may result in non-responsive bids.

### Procurement Details

* Tender Closing Date: **June 12, 2024, at 14:00:00 EDT** (see Amendment to Closing Time note above)
* Supply Arrangement: E60PQ-140003/C
* Supply Arrangement holder (General Stream of Suppliers)
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 11, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Mandatory documentation and bid submissions must be sent to Public Service and Procurement Canada, according to the notice details below:

**Notice details available at:**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19666074?extsite=MTk2NjYwNzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==


Please let me know if this is to your liking, and if anything requires further amendment.

I
